pageContext.claim: “We have a tremendous problem: People come out of prison, they can't get a job. Employers don't want to hire them. The economy is so good, they're hiring them, and they're turning out to be incredible workers. They're given a chance.”
pageContext.analysis: There's limited data tracking employment of former prisoners and no recent evidence to suggest that it has gotten any easier for people recently released from prison to get work.
